room_title: Escape room "Terminal" by Great Room Escape in Chicago
review: Went in with a group of friends to play the Terminal room and had a blast! We weren't able to escape, so we definitely plan on going back to play the other two rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Terminal" by Great Room Escape in Chicago
review: We loved the Terminal today, with a low success rate and our lack of experience we were worried that we'd be stumped but we killed it. The clues were so well planned and executed that we can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Terminal" by Great Room Escape in Chicago
review: Great customer service. Unique puzzles and clues. Amazing room designs. Terminal had an excellent theme and storyline. Houdini was challenging. And Zombie was fun and exciting.

room_title: Escape room "Terminal" by Great Room Escape in Chicago
review: We had the best time! Puzzles were hard enough to keep everyone busy and thinking. This would be great for a work team building event or a unique family event!!

room_title: Escape room "Terminal" by Great Room Escape in Chicago
review: I had a good time, the two gentlemen that explained everything were great. We chose the Terminal and it was so much harder than I expected. So just as an FYI it's difficult. But nonetheless we had a great time I definitely want to go to try another room.
